articles.author: Gaurav Gupta
articles.title: BCCI revises Ranji Trophy KOs dates; final from June 22 now
articles.description: The Board of Control for Cricket in India has rescheduled the Ranji Trophy knockouts in Bangalore by two days. Earlier, the quarterfinals of the tournament were to begin on June 4, but they will now kick off from June 6.
